smaller-triangle.prTitle: Your first preview deployment, created by the Vercel bot
smaller-triangle.prBody:
#### Hello, I’m the Vercel bot.

- To update your Vercel Tutor template, I created a new branch, pushed some changes, and opened this pull request.
- This creates a preview deployment on Vercel.

#### Next Steps:

- Wait until the “Status” becomes “✅ Ready” on the table below.
- Then click “Visit Preview” to view the deployment.

helpful-links.prComment:
#### We just pushed a new commit to add some helpful links.

- This creates a new preview deployment (accessible via the same URL once it becomes “✅ Ready”).

#### Then, we merged the pull request.

- This creates a new production deployment.

#### Next Step:

- [Click here to see the deployment progress on the Vercel dashboard](https://vercel.com/{{teamSlug}}/{{projectName}}?vercel-tutor=done).
